uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

ip_address.description: Source-Interface IP Address. If both ip_addess and vlan_id are null, configuration will be removed based on protocol. If both valid ip_address and vlan_id are given in REST request, ip_address will have preference over vlan_id.

vlan_id.description: Vlan-ID. If both ip_addess and vlan_id are null, configuration will be removed based on protocol. If both valid ip_address and vlan_id are given in REST request, ip_address will have preference over vlan_id.
